availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Cornelius Bailey (Henderson County, Kentucky, assistant auditor of Kentucky and attorney)

body.p: Henderson County, Kentucky, attorney and assistant auditor of the Commonwealth of Kentucky. Kentucky native. Son of Alexander Bailey and Mary Bailey. Married to Eliza M. Posey Bailey in Henderson County on April 5, 1865. Student in Henderson County, Kentucky in 1850. Attorney in Henderson County. Clerk in Frankfort, Kentucky in 1860. Assistant auditor of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from 1860 to 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, District 2, p. 356A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort, p. 279.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Henderson County Marriages, Film #001944390, p. 99 of microfilm.
"Kentucky State Appointments by the Auditor," Louisville Daily Courier, April 28, 1860. “Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1861,” in 1862 Kentucky Documents, Legislative Document No. 1. (Frankfort, Ky.: Jno. B. Major, State Printer, 1862), 303-308.
“Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1862,” in 1863 Kentucky Documents, Legislative Document No. 24. (Frankfort, Ky.: Wm. E. Hughes, State Printer, 1863), 298-306.
Find A Grave, "Cornelius Bailey (1837-1888)," Memorial 92103255, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/92103255 (accessed March 2, 2020).
